Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForgetfulPlayer, RandomPlayer, StratPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an abstract class for the players so that they can all be stored in one arrayList
    Author:
    Noah Jaffe 11/09/2017 Noah0m0jaffe@gmail.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected MemoryDeck boardMemory
      the board memory of player
      protected int matches
      the number of matches this player has
      private int playerID
      player ID
      protected int strat
      the strategy used by the player, could change the use of this to instanceOf

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(int id)
      creates Player object that has a board memory, sets matches to 0

      java.lang.String toString()
